## PopulatableBeraBorrow.transferCollateralGainToTrove() method

Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transferCollateralGainToTrove(): Promise<PopulatedBeraBorrowTransaction<P, SentBeraBorrowTransaction<S, BeraBorrowReceipt<R, CollateralGainTransferDetails>>>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedBeraBorrowTransaction](./lib-base.populatedberaborrowtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentBeraBorrowTransaction](./lib-base.sentberaborrowtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [BeraBorrowReceipt](./lib-base.beraborrowreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [CollateralGainTransferDetails](./lib-base.collateralgaintransferdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

The collateral gain is transfered to the Trove as additional collateral.

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [POLLEN reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.pollenreward.md)<!-- -->.
